# [`%>%`]{.blue} from the [`magrittr`]{.blue} Package

	 $thing_1$ [%>%]{.blue}  	 $thing_2$	{.center}
# What it does 

+ The symbol [`%>%`]{.blue} is called a pipe.  When describing a workflow, it is spoken as "then".
+ It normally sends the output from $thing_1$ to the first argument of $thing_2$.
 
# Demo code 
	```{r eval=FALSE}	mtcars %>%	  filter(mpg == 30.4)	```	 
# Usefull stuff 
	+ Many functions can be connected in a pipeline.	+ Start code after a pipe on a new line.	+ Indent all lines of code two spaces after the first pipe.	---
